movie.title: Infamous
movie.plot: While researching his book In Cold Blood, writer Truman Capote develops a close relationship with convicted murderers Dick Hickock and Perry Smith.

events.title: Truman Capote reads an article about the murders of the Herbert Clutter family
Richard Hickock and Perry Smith are arrested
Richard Hickock and Perry Smith are tried in court for murder
Truman Capote attends the executions of Richard Hickock and Perry Smith
